pages.body:
# Welcome to ZeroNet

[[ZeroWiki]] is a wiki platform for [[ZeroNet]], the distributed web network based on [[Bittorrent]], [[Bitcoin]] and [[Tor]]. 

[[ZeroWiki]] is public, [[cloning|clonable]]. Wikis can be used for taking notes, storing snippets, sharing knowledge by creating [[FAQ]]s and documentations, keeping track of your goals, or as simple to-do lists. See the [[help|help page]] for a more in-depth view of how it works. ZeroWiki solves the huge problem which wikipedia has, namely, that wikipedia is controlled by deletion-trolls and brainwashed scum admins.

## Useful pages

- [[zeronet|What is ZeroNet?]]
- [[zite|What is a "Zite"?]]
- [[List of Zites]]
- [[blocklists|Blocked Zeronet Sites]] 
- [[zearch|Search engine]] 
- [[zerome|What is ZeroMe?]]
- [[hubs|List of ZeroMe Hubs]]
- [[ZeroWiki:Format|ZeroWiki writing format]]
- [[proxies|List of proxies, allowing you to view ZeroNet from clearnet]]
- [[Dev ideas|Development ideas]]
- [[zerowikisandbox|Sandbox, you can play with it before editing other pages]]
- [[devresources|List of resources for ZeroNet and Zite development]]
- [[wallofshame|The Copyright Wall of Shame Community Edition]]
- [[copytrollquotes|A Collection of Quotes by Copyright Trolls]]

## Useful wikis
 - [New ZeroWiki](/1LX2wiouHctuUXtu5WkVM9TJJ3YoL6gAfm/) - Clone of ZeroWiki with more information and better organization.
 - [ZeroTuto, learning resources and tutorials related to ZeroNet](/1Jtjb5CU9aod4jtz8hF5NPPqFKofRSsb4x/)
  
*Please note that [[ZeroWiki]] is still beta software, it may have bugs and lack some features
[[ZeroWiki:Issues|Propose features and report bugs here]].*  
  

---
[日本語](/1Ezhw23VBpj1p9oZ5pf6z5HyBMVMR3Mgwm/) |[中文版本](/1QDQ1NmFAfLE8GkUFwLFYXHwnrCaAkEr6V/) |  [Deutsch](/1JJCiVtA6wY9Rmxq7JJS3EvKAFKpki3VKq)  |  [Français](/135qYXdNpf5kTWYuTJ8uautsUi91Bhvcck/) |  [Español](/1FwbupJhHcnFWGXuu3bn5VxcRVW9tx2tDQ) |  [Italiano](/167Yc4dxV2ysL7CQYeyuXpobxBKkkZ7Rpj/) |  [Português](/1QJ8rDLmn4CE2VXpMotAi7bDryRmNLM7Rm/) |  [Polski](/12Tt38zRJefsRMnAC9iai1CMSZ3PfiBDuY) | العربية | עברי  | [Русский](/1KKzUpPB2D533yKaiWA71GX44DUESsRhxU/) | [Українська](/1Ewfx8U1QvPs61QoKvoCdx775CLv1xbC7/) | Esperanto

# List of Zites: Search Engines | [[zite-list-searches-talk|Talk]]

### Sites that index content or other sites / zites can be classified as search engines.
**[EulerFinder](http://127.0.0.1:43110/13eFkhbXXQcJqd729zRLL9tMxxhz9d4UA6/).**  
New search engine for ZeroNet lightweight and fast

**[Important Zites](/1MiS3ud9JogSQpd1QVmM6ETHRmk5RgJn6E/)**
User-added zites, fast relevance-based searching with pagination, modern design, bookmarks. ZeroSites with more features (including search and bookmarks) and a better interface. Also ability to search other zites, including ZeroSites, Kiwipedia, 0List, ZeroTalk, ZeroDevTalk, and ZeroUp.
 * Zite Address: 1MiS3ud9JogSQpd1QVmM6ETHRmk5RgJn6E

**[Zirch Automated Search](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1SearchPd3khzLtsxTxKYhYUohk7c1QYd)**
Zirch is the first  fully automated search for zeronet, it crawls zeronet everyday to update it's index, and includes previews. 
 * Zite Address: 1SearchPd3khzLtsxTxKYhYUohk7c1QYd
 * Zite Discussion: [0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:5_1A3XsuLB6P7LQPCw1QWASG7RGSwrCv6Xib/Automated+Search+Engine)
 * Zite Domain: zirch.bit

**[Kaffiene Search](http://127.0.0.1:43110/search.kaffie.bit/).**  
Kaffiene Search is a zite that allows users to search an index of predefined sites for keywords and other terms. Kaffiene Search provides such features as browsing the zite through a proxy and listings sorted by peer popularity count.  
  * Zite Address:   1Mr5rX9TauvaGReB4RjCaE6D37FJQaY5Ba  
  * Zite Discussion: 
[0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:2_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh/Kaffiene+Search+Engine), 
[ZeroCentral](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Dt7FR5aNLkqAjmosWh8cMWzJu633GYN6u/?Topic:1_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh/Kaffiene+Search), 
ZeroTalk  
  * Zite Domain: 
kaffiene.bit, search.kaffie.bit

**[ZeroSearch](http://127.0.0.1:43110/zerosearch.bit).**  
ZeroSearch is the original implementation of a search engine to Zeronet. Visitors are allowed to submit their zite.  
  * Zite Address:   1ZeroeuDnL2jNS6t1epQa1SPvC91KG8ER  
  * Zite Discussion: 
0List, 
ZeroCentral, 
[ZeroTalk](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topics:5_1PNyuY1iZqXBpft4ArouqcnE4pNRGYij5i/ZeroSearch+bit+sub+topic)  
  * Zite Domain: 
zerosearch.bit 

**[CensoredSearch](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LC3ryygCrv94ZK4Nk8ELW6vE1hKwopE8T/).**  
CensoredSearch is a search engine that uses an index of clearnet sites that allows visitors to use search terms of specific sites. The source of these sites have been gathered through various News sources so website blocking of specific sites can vary by region. The zite also provides a page that offers multiple ways to bypass website censorship efforts.  
  * Zite Address:   1LC3ryygCrv94ZK4Nk8ELW6vE1hKwopE8T  
  * Zite Discussion: 
[0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:1_16bxMyoL49mWYhcZKBYVBT5zEFW9SQpiao/Censored+Search+bit), 
[ZeroCentral](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Dt7FR5aNLkqAjmosWh8cMWzJu633GYN6u/?Topic:1_16bxMyoL49mWYhcZKBYVBT5zEFW9SQpiao/Censored+Search), 
ZeroTalk,  
  * Zite Domain: 
censoredsearch.bit  

[Fuji - Free & Cloneable](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1AWAXiVLbcuncGbpyiUmDbAUpBB4r6KPKL/)

[ZSearch](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1NnopBFkeLnBUSAwcvxPCizSaqEnHFcEPH/)

[ZeroExpose Search Engine](http://zeroexposedcuclo.onion/) (Tor onion service)

**[RVRE](http://127.0.0.1:43110/bwoi.bit/).**  
RVRE is a simple search engine that allows anyone to search through an index of zites.
  * Zite Address:   1f7FYxZWSZ5YG7Nd8sGsHcWEQgvdnVvQF
  * Zite Domain: 
bwoi.bit

# Proxies

A proxy is a website that you can reach using any web-capable device that runs a multi-user [[ZeroNet]] instance. *[Learn how to host one](/kindlyfire.bit/?Post:9:Running+a+ZeroProxy)*. You can also install [[AWS Shadow Socks]].

There also is a website dedicated to listing proxies: [zeroproxies.bit](/zeroproxies.bit), but it is outdated.

## List of working proxies (they die fast)

- https://proxy.zeronet.a0z.ru/  (Adding new sites is disabled)

# Git

Git is a widely used [[source code]] management system for software development. It is a distributed revision control system with an emphasis on speed, data integrity, and support for distributed, non-linear workflows. Git was initially designed and developed in 2005 by Linux kernel developers (including Linus Torvalds) for Linux kernel development.

## External links

* [Official website](http://git-scm.com/)

# Welcome to ZeroNet

[[ZeroWiki]] is a wiki platform for [[ZeroNet]], the distributed web network based on [[Bittorrent]], [[Bitcoin]] and [[Tor]]. 

[[ZeroWiki]] is public, [[cloning|clonable]]. Wikis can be used for taking notes, storing snippets, sharing knowledge by creating [[FAQ]]s and documentations, keeping track of your goals, or as simple to-do lists. See the [[help|help page]] for a more in-depth view of how it works.

INCORRECT ARTICLE: Article should talk about Cryptography, not Databases

Database
===

What is the definition of database system?
---
Database management systems are computer software applications that interact with the user, other applications, and the database itself to capture and analyze data. A general-purpose [[DBMS]] is designed to allow the definition, creation, querying, update, and administration of databases.

What is a database program?
---
A database program is the heart of a business information system and provides file creation, data entry, update, query and reporting functions. The traditional term for database software is "database management system" (see [[DBMS]]).

What is the database management system?
---
A database management system ([[DBMS]]) is a computer program (or more typically, a suite of them) designed to manage a database, a large set of structured data, and run operations on the data requested by numerous users. Typical examples of [[DBMS]] use include accounting, human resources and customer support systems.

WARNING: BIAS

JavaScript
---

What is JavaScript?
--
JavaScript is a dynamic computer programming language. It is most commonly used as part of [[web browsers]], whose implementations allow [[client-side]] scripts to interact with the user, control the browser, communicate [[asynchronously]], and alter the document content that is displayed.

Who owns JavaScript?
---
It was born at [[Netscape]] ( first called 'Mocha' ), so it is maintained by [[Mozilla]], i.e... [[Netscape]] created [[The Mozilla Foundation]], long ago, and the [[Mozilla]] suite of [[Firefox]], [[Thunderbird]], etc... is where [[Netscape Communicator]] went. But yes, the trademark is technically "owned" by [[Oracle]].

Is JavaScript is a programming language?
---
The World's Most Misunderstood Programming Language. JavaScript, aka Mocha, aka [[LiveScript]], aka [[JScript]], aka [[ECMAScript]], is one of the world's most popular programming languages. Virtually every [[personal computer]] in the world has at least one JavaScript interpreter installed on it and in active use.

How do you enable JavaScript?
---
Enable JavaScript in your browser to see ads on your site. Click the [[Chrome]] menu icon on the browser toolbar. On the "Settings" page, click the Show advanced settings... link. Select Allow all sites to run JavaScript (recommended) in the "JavaScript" section.

# Wiki

A **wiki** is a type of website in which users can edit and contribute to its content. Examples of wikis include Wikipedia, Wiktionary, ZeroWiki and the Debian Wiki. The word 'wiki' comes from Hawaiian, meaning fast or quickly. Wikis are increasingly popular with community groups and small organizations, and are recognized as a type of 'Web 2.0' site.

Most wiki's are typically a collection of information on a specific subject such as Linux or many different subjects such as everything from Pizza to The origin of the Internet.
